entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:34 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.9°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 38.
